Giotto-Suite
============

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Giotto-Suite installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Giotto-Suite, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Giotto-Suite/3.0.1-foss-2022a-R-4.2.1
```
